name: Throw-A-Rainbow
description:
This short rainbow-making game is a submission to the Trijam #126 with the topic RAINBOWS. It was made in 5 hours. It is a hommage to the old Qbasic game Gorillas.

Use your mouse to fire rainbows and try to reach the chest full of gold.

Instructions:

  • use your mouse to aim
  • click once to start loading up and click twice to fire. The longer you wait, the faster your rainbow will travel
  • on top of the screen you see how much rainbow material you have left
  • collect the colorful stars to refill your rainbow material
  • collect the white arrows to move your player to the next building

I had a bit more than the planned 3 hours, mainly because I had to figure out how to do trajectory thing...
